data.title: The Rapture | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase The Rapture on digital and stream instantly or download offline. Rapture (rap'chur) 1. ecstatic joy or delight. 2. a state of extreme sexual ecstasy. 3. the feeling of being transported to another sphere of existence. 4. the experience of being spirited away to Heaven just before the Apocalypse. Mimi Rogers and David Duchovny star in this provocative and haunting film about a lonely, sex-obsessed telephone operator who discovers faith--and where that faith leads--The Rapture.
data.text:
Nothing more than a cheap horror film that uncomfortably flirts with blasphemy. [Full review in Spanish]

January 4, 2023

It's one of the most terrifying of religious films; an astounding synthesis of style and subject, it merges the meticulously practical and the terrifyingly visionary with a breathtaking audacity.

October 30, 2020

It is all original, interesting, sympathetic and not at all moving.

August 30, 2018

One of the strangest little films of 1991.

April 10, 2018

The Rapture is far from perfect, but it's a riveting act of provocation.

February 7, 2018
